bibl.title: An Account of a Private Association in Tebtynis. P.Tebt. II 573 Descr.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Tebt. II, 573 recto descr. = P. Aegyptus Cent. 32 A; 573 verso descr. = P. Aegyptus Cent. 32 B
Mario C.D. Paganini, An Account of a Private Association in Tebtynis. P.Tebt. II 573 Descr.
Edizione di testi nel centenario della rivista Aegyptus (P.Aegyptus Cent.). Tomo II = Aegyptus 101 (2021) pp. 35-55, figg.

A. P.Tebt. II 573 descr. recto. The Account of the "Club of Damas of Twenty Men". Tebtynis, (first half/mid?) Ip. - B. P.Tebt. II 573 descr. verso. Fragmentary Account of Unidentified Character. Tebtynis, Ia ex.-Ip in.
bibl.note: A. P.Tebt. II 573 descr. recto. The Account of the "Club of Damas of Twenty Men". Tebtynis, (first half/mid?) Ip. - B. P.Tebt. II 573 descr. verso. Fragmentary Account of Unidentified Character. Tebtynis, Ia ex.-Ip in.
